class.name: AbilitySystemTask
class.brief_description: Base class for asynchronous gameplay tasks.
class.description: [AbilitySystemTask] is the base class for all asynchronous actions that can be performed during an ability's execution.

method.name: end_task
method.description: Ends the task and emits the signal.

method.name: play_montage
method.description: Creates a task that plays an animation and completes when it finishes.

method.name: wait_delay
method.description: Creates a task that waits for the specified duration before completing.

signal.name: completed
signal.description: Emitted when the task is finished.

constants.constant: Generic task with no specific behavior.
